de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.distance

Class PrimitiveDistanceQuery<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.distance.AbstractDistanceQuery<O>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query.distance.PrimitiveDistanceQuery<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Database object type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseQuery, DistanceQuery<O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery, SpatialPrimitiveDistanceQuery

    public class PrimitiveDistanceQuery<O>
extends AbstractDistanceQuery<O>
    Run a database query in a database context.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
